article_title: Struggling Finland Asks Sweden’s Ex-Finance Minister for Economic Advice
article_text:
STOCKHOLM—Finland’s government is hoping an outside perspective can help the country out of its economic troubles and has asked Sweden’s former finance minister Anders Borg to share his thoughts on a way forward.

In a statement late Tuesday, Finland’s government said it had asked Mr. Borg to prepare a report taking stock of Finland’s current economic state and outlining options for future economic policy.

Mr. Borg quit...
